summary.span: 是一个类型转换器，用于在字体名称与其他各种表示形式之间进行转换。

span.span: is a type converter that is used to convert a font name to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该列表是独占的其他任何值不都无效，如在枚举数据类型。If the list is exclusive, no other values are valid, such as in an enumeration data type. 如果该列表不是独占的则说明有的标准值列表之外的其他有效值提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values provides.
